org.apache.reef.wake.remote

Interface Encoder<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the objects serialized
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Codec<T>, StreamingCodec<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteCodec, ByteEncoder, ListCodec, MultiCodec, MultiEncoder, NamingLookupRequestCodec, NamingLookupResponseCodec, NamingRegisterRequestCodec, NamingRegisterResponseCodec, NamingUnregisterRequestCodec, NSMessageCodec, ObjectSerializableCodec, ObjectWritableCodec, REEFMessageCodec, RemoteEventCodec, RemoteEventEncoder, StringCodec, StringCodec

    public interface Encoder<T>
    Interface for serialization routines that translate back and forth between byte arrays with low latency.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] encode(T obj)
      Encodes the given object into a Byte Array

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        byte[] encode(T obj)
        Encodes the given object into a Byte Array
        Parameters:
        obj -
        Returns:
        a byte[] representation of the object
